__e: And as I told Bill, there comes a time in every man's life when he needs to move out of his mother's house.
Oh, don't let me chase you out of a place you're really not supposed to be in.
If you think you can pull something like that and just get away with it...
And why can't you just go for the day and come back?
How about what you do for me, is you leave here and you never see me again.
That's why you should get out of this house.
I mean, that is why you're blowing back out of town, right?
Can you get the fuck out of my house and out of my Iife forever?
It's time for you to get out there.
I told you to get out of town and stay out.
I just don't trust you to make it out of here alone.
I just don't trust you to make it out of here alone.
So, unless there's something you can do for me, you can take it elsewhere, alright?
I think moving out of that house has been good for you.
I mean, it just feels like ever since you got here all you've done is leave.

Well, I said you're not going anywhere and that's final.
